notesStmt.note: Mishnah endings denoted by a colon. There are also text divisions with no number, denoted by a space. The text is divided into numbered units (mishnayot). The first number in the fragment is 5, which starts עשרה דברים נבראו, and ends at 12, which follows the Mishnah that ends וקשה לרצות רשע (here: קשה לרשות, probably errant copy).

msIdentifier.repository: Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library
